mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEFINE (WORD, ID, PW, INFO, SPLITWORD, CURRENTTIME) VALUES (#{word}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{editor1}, #{splitWord}, now())
INSERT INTO DEFINESUB (CONNUM, SPACE, CONTENT, ID, PW, GROUPNUM) VALUES (#{connum}, #{space}, #{content}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{groupnum})
mapper.select: SELECT NUM, ID, PW, WORD, INFO, UP, DOWN, SPLITWORD, CURRENTTIME FROM DEFINE ORDER BY NUM DESC
SELECT NUM, ID, PW, WORD, INFO, UP, DOWN, SPLITWORD, CURRENTTIME FROM DEFINE WHERE WORD = #{linkWord} ORDER BY UP DESC
SELECT NUM, ID FROM RECOMMENDATION WHERE NUM = #{conNum};
SELECT NUM, GROUPNUM, CONNUM, SPACE, CONTENT, ID FROM DEFINESUB ORDER BY GROUPNUM ASC;
SELECT NUM, CONNUM, SPACE, CONTENT, PW FROM DEFINESUB WHERE NUM = #{numb};
mapper.update: UPDATE DEFINE SET UP = UP + 1 WHERE NUM = #{conNum}
UPDATE DEFINE SET DOWN = DOWN + 1 WHERE NUM = #{conNum}
